main event: Two lights were observed descending in pairs at the same rate, same size, and same shape, with the appearance of burning flares, and appeared to hit the ocean in the vicinity of the Hawaiian Islands.
interesting points: The lights were observed for only 20 seconds.
The description of the lights was similar to that of a balloon or flare.
The sighting was evaluated as possibly being a satellite or meteor.
Several other sightings of bright lights were reported in the area around the same time.
The sightings were evaluated as not posing a threat and were likely natural phenomena such as meteors.
sighted object: Two bright lights descending in pairs
